sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates a completion for the chat message

Inputs:

  • Model - String - ID of the model to use.
  • Messages - Array - The messages to generate chat completions for, in the chat format.
  • Max Tokens - Integer - The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion.
  • Temperature - Float - The sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
  • Top P - Float - An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.
  • N - Integer - How many completions to generate for each prompt.
  • Stop - Array - Up to 4 sequences where the API will stop generating further tokens. The returned text will not contain the stop sequence.
  • Presence Penalty - Float - Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
  • Frequency Penalty - Float - Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
  • Logit Bias - JSON - Modify the likelihood of specified tokens appearing in the completion.
  • User - String - A unique identifier representing your end-user, which can help OpenAI to monitor and detect abuse.

Outputs:

  • Action Status - Object
    • Code - Integer - Returns 0 if success and error code if failure occurs.
    • Message - String - 'Success' if the whole request succeeds or respective error message if a failure occurs.
  • ID - String - Unique Id.
  • Object - String - Details of the API used for the request.
  • Created - Integer - Timestamp of the request.
  • Model - String - Details of the model used for the request.
  • Choices - Array of Objects - Contains the Completion chat messages for the given messages along with index & finish reason.
  • Usage - JSON - Count of Prompt Tokens, Completion Tokens & Total Tokens.

Error Codes - Error Messages:

  • 401 - Invalid Authentication
  • 401 - Incorrect API key provided
  • 401 - You must be a member of an organization to use the API
  • 429 - Rate limit reached for requests
  • 429 - You exceeded your current quota, please check your plan and billing details
  • 429 - The engine is currently overloaded, please try again later
  • 500 - The server had an error while processing your request

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates a completion for the chat message

Inputs:

  • Model - String - ID of the model to use.
  • Messages - Array - The messages to generate chat completions for, in the chat format.
  • Max Tokens - Integer - The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion.
  • Temperature - Float - The sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
  • Top P - Float - An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.
  • N - Integer - How many completions to generate for each prompt.
  • Stop - Array - Up to 4 sequences where the API will stop generating further tokens. The returned text will not contain the stop sequence.
  • Presence Penalty - Float - Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
  • Frequency Penalty - Float - Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
  • Logit Bias - JSON - Modify the likelihood of specified tokens appearing in the completion.
  • User - String - A unique identifier representing your end-user, which can help OpenAI to monitor and detect abuse.

Outputs:

  • Action Status - Object
    • Code - Integer - Returns 0 if success and error code if failure occurs.
    • Message - String - 'Success' if the whole request succeeds or respective error message if a failure occurs.
  • ID - String - Unique Id.
  • Object - String - Details of the API used for the request.
  • Created - Integer - Timestamp of the request.
  • Model - String - Details of the model used for the request.
  • Choices - Array of Objects - Contains the Completion chat messages for the given messages along with index & finish reason.
  • Usage - JSON - Count of Prompt Tokens, Completion Tokens & Total Tokens.

Error Codes - Error Messages:

  • 401 - Invalid Authentication
  • 401 - Incorrect API key provided
  • 401 - You must be a member of an organization to use the API
  • 429 - Rate limit reached for requests
  • 429 - You exceeded your current quota, please check your plan and billing details
  • 429 - The engine is currently overloaded, please try again later
  • 500 - The server had an error while processing your request
